mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MB WHERE MB_ID=#{id}
SELECT MB_PW FROM MB WHERE MB_ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM MB WHERE MB_ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MB SET MB_GRADE='X' WHERE MB_ID=#{mj_mbid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM IA WHERE B.AB_MBID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM IV WHERE R.RAB_MBID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM ISP WHERE B.SB_MBID=#{id}

select * from( select rownum AS RN,AB_AUNUM,AB_MBID,AUI_IMG,AU_TITLE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AB_AUNUM ORDER BY AB_AUNUM DESC) AS RankNo from IA where AB_MBID=#{id} and rownum<=#{num}*5 ) where rn>=#{num}*5-4 AND RankNo=1
select * from( select rownum AS RN,RAB_RANUM,RAB_MBID,RA_IMAGE,RA_TITLE from IV where RAB_MBID=#{id} and rownum<=#{num}*5 ) where rn>=#{num}*5-4

select * from( select rownum AS RN,SB_SSNUM,SB_MBID,SSI_IMG,SS_TITLE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SB_SSNUM ORDER BY SB_SSNUM DESC) AS RankNo from ISP where SB_MBID=#{id} and rownum<=#{num}*5 ) where rn>=#{num}*5-4 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from IA where AB_MBID=#{id}
select count(*) from IV where RAB_MBID=#{id}
select count(*) from ISP where SB_MBID=#{id}

select * from( select rownum AS RN,AUP_PTNUM,AUP_RANUM,AUP_MBID_N,AUP_NAME,AUP_ADDRESS,AUP_PHONE,AUP_QTY,AUP_PRICE,AUP_TRACK, AUP_STEP,AUI_IMG,AU_MBID_W,AU_TITLE,AUT_DATE,AUT_KIND,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AUP_PTNUM ORDER BY AUP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from AUPVIEWTEST where AUP_MBID_N=#{id} and rownum<=#{num}*4 ) where rn>=#{num}*4-3 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from AUPVIEWTEST where AUP_MBID_N=#{id}
mapper.update: update AUP SET aup_step=4 where aup_ptnum=${aup_ptnum}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum AS RN,AUP_PTNUM,AUP_RANUM,AUP_MBID_N,AUP_NAME,AUP_ADDRESS,AUP_PHONE,AUP_QTY,AUP_PRICE,AUP_TRACK, AUP_STEP,AUI_IMG,AU_MBID_W,AU_TITLE,AUT_DATE,AUT_KIND,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AUP_PTNUM ORDER BY AUP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from AUPVIEWTEST where AU_MBID_W=#{id} and rownum<=#{num}*3 ) where rn>=#{num}*3-2 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from AUPVIEWTEST where AU_MBID_W=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AUT WHERE AUT_AUNUM=${aup_ranum} AND AUT_MBID=#{aup_mbid_n} AND AUT_DATE=to_date(#{aut_date}, 'RR/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum AS RN,RAP_PTNUM,RAP_RANUM,RAP_MBID_N,RAP_NAME,RAP_ADDRESS,RAP_MBID_W,RAP_PHONE,RAP_PRICE,RAP_TRACK,RAP_DAYS, RAP_STEP,RA_MBID,RA_IMAGE,RA_TITLE,RA_OC,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY RAP_PTNUM ORDER BY RAP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from RAPVIEW where RAP_MBID_N=#{id} and rownum<=${num}*3 ) where rn>=${num}*3-2 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from RAPVIEW where RAP_MBID_N=#{id}
SELECT * FROM RAPVIEW where RAP_PTNUM=${rap_ptnum}

select * from( select rownum AS RN,RAP_PTNUM,RAP_RANUM,RAP_MBID_N,RAP_NAME,RAP_ADDRESS,RAP_MBID_W,RAP_PHONE,RAP_PRICE,RAP_TRACK,RAP_DAYS, RAP_STEP,RA_MBID,RA_IMAGE,RA_TITLE,RA_OC,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY RAP_PTNUM ORDER BY RAP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from RAPVIEW where RAP_MBID_W=#{id} and rownum<=${num}*3 ) where rn>=${num}*3-2 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from RAPVIEW where RAP_MBID_W=#{id}
mapper.update: update RAP SET RAP_STEP=4 where rap_ptnum=${rap_ptnum}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MB WHERE MB_ID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM NF WHERE NF_MBID_R=#{id}
SELECT AUP_MBID_N FROM AUP WHERE AUP_PTNUM=${aup_ptnum}
mapper.delete: UPDATE NF SET NF_CHECK=2 WHERE NF_MBID_R=#{id}
UPDATE NF SET NF_CHECK=2 WHERE NF_NUM=${nf_num}
mapper.select: select * from( select AUT_AUNUM,AUT_MBID,AU_TITLE,AUT_PRICE,AU_DATE+3 as AU_DATE,AUT_KIND,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY AUT_AUNUM ORDER BY AUT_PRICE DESC) AS RankNo from AU_AUT where AUT_MBID=#{id} AND AUT_KIND != 'I' ) where RankNo=1
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AUT WHERE AUT_AUNUM=${aut_aunum} AND AUT_MBID=#{aut_mbid} AND AUT_KIND !='I'
mapper.select: select count(aw_kind) from aw where aw_mbid=#{id} and aw_kind='금'
select count(aw_kind) from aw where aw_mbid=#{id} and aw_kind='은'
select count(aw_kind) from aw where aw_mbid=#{id} and aw_kind='동'
select * from( select rownum AS RN,AQ_NUM,AQ_MBID,AQ_TYE,AQ_TITLE, AQ_CONTENTS,AQ_DATE,ABC,AQI_IMG from AQ_QR where aq_mbid=#{id} and rownum<=${num}*8 ) where rn>=${num}*8-7 order by AQ_NUM desc
select * from qr where QR_AQNUM=#{aq_num}
select count(*) from aq where aq_mbid=#{id}
select * from AQ_QR where aq_num=${aq_num}

select * from( select rownum AS RN,SSP_PTNUM,SSP_SSNUM,SSP_MBID_N,SSP_NAME,SSP_ADDRESS,SSP_PHONE,SSP_TRACK,SSP_STEP,SSI_IMG,SS_MBID_W, SS_TITLE,SS_PRICE,SS_GOALQTY,SS_DATE,SS_CONTENTS,SS_DATE+3 as end_date,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SSP_PTNUM ORDER BY SSP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from ssp_ss_ssi where SSP_MBID_N=#{id} and rownum<=${num}*3 ) where rn>=${num}*3-2 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from ssp_ss_ssi where SSP_MBID_N=#{id}
select count(*) from sst where sst_ssnum=${ssp_ssnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE ssp SET ssp_step= 3 where ssp_ptnum=${ssp_ptnum}
mapper.select: select ss_date from ss

select * from( select rownum AS RN,SSP_PTNUM,SSP_SSNUM,SSP_MBID_N,SSP_NAME,SSP_ADDRESS,SSP_PHONE,SSP_TRACK,SSP_STEP,SSI_IMG,SS_MBID_W, SS_TITLE,SS_PRICE,SS_GOALQTY,SS_DATE,SS_CONTENTS,SS_DATE+3 as end_date,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SSP_PTNUM ORDER BY SSP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from ssp_ss_ssi where SS_MBID_W=#{id} and rownum<=${num}*3 ) where rn>=${num}*3-2 AND RankNo=1
select count(*) from sst where sst_ssnum=${ssp_ssnum}
select count(*) from ssp_ss_ssi where SS_MBID_W=#{id}
SELECT SS_DATE+3 AS END_DATE FROM SS
mapper.update: UPDATE ssp SET ssp_step= 2 where ssp_ptnum=${ssp_ptnum}
mapper.select: select * from( select rownum AS RN,SSP_PTNUM,SSP_SSNUM,SSP_MBID_N,SSP_NAME,SSP_ADDRESS,SSP_PHONE,SSP_TRACK,SSP_STEP,SSI_IMG,SS_MBID_W, SS_TITLE,SS_PRICE,SS_GOALQTY,SS_DATE+3 as SS_DATE ,SS_CONTENTS,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY SSP_PTNUM ORDER BY SSP_PTNUM DESC) AS RankNo from ssp_ss_ssi )where ss_date=#{localDateTime} and RankNo=1
mapper.update: update ssp set ssp_name=#{ssp_name}, ssp_address=#{ssp_address}, ssp_phone=#{ssp_phone}, ssp_step=4 where ssp_ptnum=${ssp_ptnum}
update ssp set ssp_track=#{ssp_track}, ssp_step=5 where SSP_PTNUM=${ssp_ptnum}
mapper.select: select mb_point from mb where mb_id=#{mb_id}
mapper.update: update ssp set ssp_step=6 where SSP_PTNUM=${ssp_ptnum}
mapper.insert:
SELECT BD_SEQ.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES(BD_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{bd_kind},#{bd_mbid},#{bd_title},#{bd_contents},DEFAULT,DEFAULT,DEFAULT)
mapper.update: update RAP SET RAP_STEP=1 where RAP_PTNUM=${rap_ptnum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RAT WHERE RAT_NUM=${rap_ranum} AND RAT_MBID_W=#{rap_mbid_w} AND RAT_DECIDE !='O'
